removeToken(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKPoo.details: Logic in the CRP controls when ths can be called. There are two related permissions:      AddRemoveTokens - which allows removing down to the underlying KPool limit of two      RemoveAllTokens - which allows completely draining the pool by removing all tokens                        This can result in a non-viable pool with 0 or 1 tokens (by design),                        meaning all swapping or binding operations would fail in this state

params.KPool: - Core KPool the CRP is wrapping

updateWeight(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKPo.details: Refactored to library to make CRPFactory deployable

params.KPool: - Core KPool the CRP is wrapping
- Core KPool the CRP is wrapping
params.endBlock: - when weights will be at their final values
params.minimumWeightChangeBlockPeriod: - needed to validate the block period
params.newWeights: - final weights we want to get to
params.startBlock: - when weights should start to change

verifyTokenCompliance(address[]).details: Will revert if invalid - overloaded to save space in the main contract

applyAddToken(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKP.notice: Add the token previously committed (in commitAddToken) to the pool

commitAddToken(IKPool,address,uint256,ui.notice: Schedule (commit) a token to be added; must call applyAddToken after a fixed         number of blocks to actually add the token

exitPool(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKPool,u.notice: Exit a pool - redeem pool tokens for underlying assets

exitswapExternAmountOut(ConfigurableRigh.notice: Exit a pool - redeem pool tokens for a specific amount of underlying assets         Asset must be present in the pool

exitswapPoolAmountIn(ConfigurableRightsP.notice: Exit a pool - redeem a specific number of pool tokens for an underlying asset         Asset must be present in the pool, and will incur an EXIT_FEE (if set to non-zero)

joinswapExternAmountIn(ConfigurableRight.notice: Join by swapping a fixed amount of an external token in (must be present in the pool)         System calculates the pool token amount

joinswapPoolAmountOut(ConfigurableRights.notice: Join by swapping an external token in (must be present in the pool)         To receive an exact amount of pool tokens out. System calculates the deposit amount

pokeWeights(IKPool,ConfigurableRightsPoo.notice: External function called to make the contract update weights according to plan

removeToken(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKPoo.notice: Remove a token from the pool

updateWeight(ConfigurableRightsPool,IKPo.notice: Update the weight of an existing token

updateWeightsGradually(IKPool,Configurab.notice: Update weights in a predetermined way, between startBlock and endBlock,         through external cals to pokeWeights

verifyTokenCompliance(address).notice: Non ERC20-conforming tokens are problematic; don't allow them in pools

verifyTokenCompliance(address[]).notice: Non ERC20-conforming tokens are problematic; don't allow them in pools
